Name: castsource
column6: oid of the source data type

Name: casttarget
column6: oid of the target data type

Name: castfunc
column6: the oid of the function to use to perform this cast. zero is stored if the data types are binary compatible (that is, no run-time operation is needed to perform the cast)

Name: castcontext
column6: indicates what contexts the cast may be invoked in. e means only as an explicit cast (using cast or :: syntax). a means implicitly in assignment to a target column, as well as explicitly. i means implicitly in expressions, as well as the other cases
